text: Na sīsappacālakaṃ antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā
edit: Na sīsappacālakaṃ antaraghare gamissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā

translations.transtext: 19. I will not go swinging my head in inhabited areas: a training to be observed.
๑๙. พึงทำศึกษาว่า “เราจักไม่โคลงศีรษะไปในละแวกบ้าน”
19. I shall not go fidgetting (shaking, drooping) the head in inhabited areas: this is a training to be done.
